name: Glade (Jestersheepy)
description:
A third person, base building protoype set in a light vs dark world. Go out into the darkness to acquire resources to build your base.
Glade is a 3 day gamejam made in Unreal with myself and Adam Ostridge. 
The current build has some bug fixes beyond the 3 days to make it more playable.

We didn't get to finish everything that was planned to which we are now slowly developing it further in our spare time. 

Controls: 

Space bar = Crack open resources found in the wild

E = Interact

W, A, S, D = Movement

Controller is supported.
